title: to climbing ADC's. try my super lifesteal build
body:
use it mostly on vayne and twitch i guess


warlords, BT, botrk, mallet, zzrot, bers boots
oh and. ruunans first on twitch. shivv first on vayne. i like that to help waveclear

15% attackspeed reds. 4.5% lifesteal quints, 27 armor yellows. 27 mr blues

my logic is. who cares about armor penetration when you get focused every game anyway. may as well go the ultra lifesteal build and your damage is lower, but your a immortal god

reason i get zzrot and mallet is because the zzrot is pretty helpful when your team is 5v5 sieging. and i like mallet on vayne twitch. so provides a nice chunk of armor+mr+hp in those 2 items plus the slow


lategame with the red potion you have like 20+20+10+2+15+4.5 = 71.5% lifesteal. and if u sell boots for deaths dance damn thats 86.5% lifesteal. who needs a damn last whisper?

also u run 8% healing 5% armor masterys.  4% speed 2% vamp bounty double sword armor penn warlords

so damn playa. your a tank, with mr/armor. and fricken 87% lifesteal? proken playa. broken


to finish. MAYBEEEEEEEEEEEE this build is really bad? but damn. it sure feels strong when i do it

replies.body:
People are actually building Runaan's on Vayne with this build now. Why? Because each bolt procs the lifesteal effect, essentially tripling the lifesteal you buy.

I'm a Twitch main, and I know how to play his lane phase, and I would never build this same build on him. Ghostblade, Runaan's, IE, then maybe lifesteal if I'm ahead and don't need damage, and I always run Fervor on him. Why? Because with any less, he doesn't do enough damage in fights. Vayne's W lets her deal damage without needing to build it too much, so she can get away with a lifesteal heavy build. Twitch really can't, his passive is a tiny amount of true damage and his E doesn't do very much in teamfights, it's mostly used to assassinate.
